Title: Slumber Party Panic
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story by), Timothy McKeon (story by), Elizabeth Ito, Adam Muto, Timothy McKeon (staff writer)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Hynden Walch, Niki Yang
Plot: Princess Bumblegum's latest experiment accidentally unleashes an undead horde upon the Candy Kingdom.
